desc: ３ターンの間、味方単体の攻撃力、防御力を３０％アップ

dictionary.lore: This powerful blend made from a Brute Elixir and a Titan Elixir is made by the Akras Summoners' Hall and is given to Summoners who travel far and wide. Though lacking in potency, its ability to boost both Atk and Def powers has gained it considerable popularity among Summoners. However, many have expressed discontent over the low limit of how many can be carried at once.

name: 戦神の薬
